<rule id="springboot-devtools-to-quarkus-0000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile in="pom.xml" matches="/m:project/m:dependencies/m:dependency[m:artifactId = 'spring-boot-devtools']">
                   <namespace prefix="m" uri="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Remove spring-boot-devtools dependency">
                    <message>
                        Remove the spring-boot-devtools dependency.
                        Quarkus has its own set of development tools integrated by default.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/tooling" title="Quarkus development tools"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
